What is Verus's consensus algorithm, and what benefits does it offer?

Verus's consensus algorithm is based on Proof of Power (Verus PoP), a 50-50 split of Proof of Stake and Proof of Work. This hybrid solution offers a provable defense against 51% hash attacks and solves the "nothing at stake" and "weak subjectivity" problems inherent in some other Proof of Stake systems.
